title: Gift of Gab
text: This spell requires 2 gp, which is consumed as tax for using the spell. It can be activated when you speak to another creature. When you cast this spell, you skillfully reshape the memories of listeners in your immediate area, so that each creature of your choice within 5 feet of you forgets everything you said within the last 6 seconds. Those creatures then remember that you actually said the words you speak as the verbal component of the spell.
